articles.title: Europeans urged to ditch short flights, take trains instead - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: Greenpeace says over one-third of the busiest short-haul flights in Europe have viable train alternatives which are far less polluting.
articles.content:
A study commissioned by the environmental group Greenpeace shows that over one-third of the busiest short-haul flights in Europe have viable train alternatives which are far less polluting.

articles.title: 'No urgent need' for Covid vaccine boosters, say European experts - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: Fractures emerge between countries over who should be eligible for third jabs, as scientists in the US question need for extra vaccination
articles.content:
Divergence over who is eligible for booster jabs has emerged between European countries over recent days.
